Plot: A blue collar worker tries to cover things up when his stepson is killed in a suspicious accident, but a local reporter senses that something's amiss.
Title: God's Pocket
Writer: Peter Dexter (novel), Alex Metcalf (screenplay), John Slattery (screenplay)
Actors: Christina Hendricks, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Eddie Marsan, Caleb Landry Jones
tomatoConsensus: Well-cast but frustratingly clichéd, God's Pocket fails to strike a sensible balance between comedy and drama.
